item.title: Nice names
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: I think some of the names in the middle east sound so nice: "Kabul", "Qatar" (I pronounce 'Ku-TAR', not 'cutter'), "Al-Nasiriyah", "Afghanistan", "Kandahar", "Basra", "Kirkuk", "Tikrit" and "Baghdad". Even "Iraq" is a cool name (but not "Iran", that's a Flock of Seagulls song). Iraq even has a great Internet top-level domain name: iq.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: THANK YOU FOR YOUR ADMIRE BY ARABIC NAMES IN THE ARAB WORLD WE HAVE MANY NICE NAMES AND IT IS RECOMMENDED BY OUR RELEIGION 'ISLAM' TO SELECT NICE NAMES FOR YOUR BABY. TAKE SOME EXAMPLES: LAYALA FATIMAH ZAINAB KAWSAR NAJLA NAWAL SAKHR NAMMIR SULTAN AMEER BASIL
